# 12.1 Size

```{r}
base <- ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy, size = cyl)) + 
  geom_point()

base
base + scale_size(range = c(1, 2))
```

```{r}
planets <- planets %>% filter(Name %in% c("mercury", "Venus", "Earth", "Mars", "Jupiter", "Satur", "Uranus", "Neptune"))

```

```{r}
base <- ggplot(planets, aes(1, Name, size = `Radius (RJ)`)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = NULL) + 
  labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, size = NULL)
  
base + ggtitle("not to scale")
base + 
  scale_radius(limits = c(0, NA), range = c(0, 10)) + 
  ggtitle("to scale")
```


# 12.5 Identity scales
```{r}
head(luv_colours)

ggplot(luv_colours, aes(u, v)) + 
geom_point(aes(colour = col), size = 3) + 
scale_color_identity() + 
coord_equal()
```
